sqlMap.select: select ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_BANKACCTCODE, PAYEE_BANKACCTTYPE, PAYEE_BANKCODE, PAYEE_BANKNAME, PAYEE_OPENINGBANKNAME, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCE, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCENAME, PAYEE_BANKCITY, PAYEE_BANKCITYNAME, PAYMENT_REASON, FAILED_REASON, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TRADE_ALIAS, TRADE_TYPE, PAYEE_MOBILE, BANK_ORDERID, FOREIGN_ORDERID, FUNDOUT_BANKCODE, FUNDOUT_BANKNAME, FUNDOUT_MODE, PRIORITY, PARENT_ORDERID, BANK_NUMBER,CHANNEL_CODE from FUNDOUT_ORDER where ORDER_ID = #orderId:DECIMAL#

select ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_BANKACCTCODE, PAYEE_BANKACCTTYPE, PAYEE_BANKCODE, PAYEE_BANKNAME, PAYEE_OPENINGBANKNAME, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCE, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCENAME, PAYEE_BANKCITY, PAYEE_BANKCITYNAME, PAYMENT_REASON, FAILED_REASON, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TRADE_ALIAS, TRADE_TYPE, PAYEE_MOBILE, BANK_ORDERID, FOREIGN_ORDERID, FUNDOUT_BANKCODE, FUNDOUT_BANKNAME, FUNDOUT_MODE, PRIORITY, PARENT_ORDERID, BANK_NUMBER,CHANNEL_CODE from FUNDOUT_ORDER
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT 200 || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yymmddhh24mi') || LPAD(SEQ_FO_GLOBE_CYCLE.nextval, 6, 0) AS ID FROM DUAL
insert into FUNDOUT_ORDER (ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_BANKACCTCODE, PAYEE_BANKACCTTYPE, PAYEE_BANKCODE, PAYEE_BANKNAME, PAYEE_OPENINGBANKNAME, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCE, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCENAME, PAYEE_BANKCITY, PAYEE_BANKCITYNAME, PAYMENT_REASON, FAILED_REASON, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TRADE_ALIAS, TRADE_TYPE, PAYEE_MOBILE, BANK_ORDERID, FOREIGN_ORDERID, FUNDOUT_BANKCODE, FUNDOUT_BANKNAME, FUNDOUT_MODE, PRIORITY, PARENT_ORDERID,BANK_NUMBER,RISK_LEVE_CODE,ACCOUNT_MODE,IS_LOANING,BALANCE,FUNDOUT_RATE) values (#orderId:DECIMAL#, #orderType:DECIMAL#, #orderSmallType:VARCHAR#, #orderStatus:DECIMAL#, #orderAmount:DECIMAL#, #isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#, #fee:DECIMAL#, #realpayAmount:DECIMAL#, #realoutAmount:DECIMAL#, #payerName:VARCHAR#, #payerLoginName:VARCHAR#, #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#, #payerMemberType:DECIMAL#, #payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#, #payerAcctType:DECIMAL#, #payeeName:VARCHAR#, #payeeBankAcctCode:VARCHAR#, #payeeBankAcctType:DECIMAL#, #payeeBankCode:VARCHAR#, #payeeBankName:VARCHAR#, #payeeOpeningBankName:VARCHAR#, #payeeBankProvince:VARCHAR#, #payeeBankProvinceName:VARCHAR#, #payeeBankCity:VARCHAR#, #payeeBankCityName:VARCHAR#, #paymentReason:VARCHAR#, #failedReason:VARCHAR#, #createDate:TIMESTAMP#, #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, #tradeAlias:VARCHAR#, #tradeType:DECIMAL#, #payeeMobile:VARCHAR#, #bankOrderId:VARCHAR#, #foreignOrderId:VARCHAR#, #fundoutBankCode:VARCHAR#, #fundoutBankName:VARCHAR#, #fundoutMode:DECIMAL#, #priority:DECIMAL#, #parentOrderId:DECIMAL#,#bankNumber:VARCHAR#,#riskLeveCode:VARCHAR#,#accountMode:VARCHAR#,#isLoaning:DECIMAL#,#balance:DECIMAL#,#fundoutRate#)
sqlMap.update: update FUNDOUT_ORDER set ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#, ORDER_SMALLTYPE = #orderSmallType:VARCHAR#, ORDER_STATUS = #orderStatus:DECIMAL#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #orderAmount:DECIMAL#, IS_PAYERPAYFEE = #isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#, FEE = #fee:DECIMAL#, REALPAY_AMOUNT = #realpayAmount:DECIMAL#, REALOUT_AMOUNT = #realoutAmount:DECIMAL#, PAYER_NAME = #payerName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_LOGINNAME = #payerLoginName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #payerMemberType:DECIMAL#, PAYER_ACCTCODE = #payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#, PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #payerAcctType:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_NAME = #payeeName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKACCTCODE = #payeeBankAcctCode:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKACCTTYPE = #payeeBankAcctType:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_BANKCODE = #payeeBankCode:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKNAME = #payeeBankName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_OPENINGBANKNAME = #payeeOpeningBankName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCE = #payeeBankProvince:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCENAME = #payeeBankProvinceName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKCITY = #payeeBankCity:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKCITYNAME = #payeeBankCityName:VARCHAR#, PAYMENT_REASON = #paymentReason:VARCHAR#, FAILED_REASON = #failedReason:VARCHAR#, CREATE_DATE = #createDate:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATE_DATE = #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, TRADE_ALIAS = #tradeAlias:VARCHAR#, TRADE_TYPE = #tradeType:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_MOBILE = #payeeMobile:VARCHAR#, BANK_ORDERID = #bankOrderId:VARCHAR#, FOREIGN_ORDERID = #foreignOrderId:VARCHAR#, FUNDOUT_BANKCODE = #fundoutBankCode:VARCHAR#, FUNDOUT_BANKNAME = #fundoutBankName:VARCHAR#, FUNDOUT_MODE = #fundoutMode:DECIMAL#, PRIORITY = #priority:DECIMAL#, PARENT_ORDERID = #parentOrderId:DECIMAL#, BANK_NUMBER = #bankNumber:VARCHAR# where ORDER_ID = #orderId:DECIMAL#

update FUNDOUT_ORDER
ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#
ORDER_SMALLTYPE = #orderSmallType:VARCHAR#
ORDER_STATUS = #orderStatus:DECIMAL#
ORDER_AMOUNT = #orderAmount:DECIMAL#
IS_PAYERPAYFEE = #isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#
FEE = #fee:DECIMAL#
REALPAY_AMOUNT = #realpayAmount:DECIMAL#
REALOUT_AMOUNT = #realoutAmount:DECIMAL#
PAYER_NAME = #payerName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_LOGINNAME = #payerLoginName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #payerMemberType:DECIMAL#
PAYER_ACCTCODE = #payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#
PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #payerAcctType:DECIMAL#
PAYEE_NAME = #payeeName:VARCHAR#
PAYEE_BANKACCTCODE = #payeeBankAcctCode:VARCHAR#

PAYEE_BANKCITYNAME = #payeeBankCityName:VARCHAR#
PAYMENT_REASON = #paymentReason:VARCHAR#
FAILED_REASON = #failedReason:VARCHAR#

UPDATE_DATE = #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#
TRADE_ALIAS = #tradeAlias:VARCHAR#
TRADE_TYPE = #tradeType:DECIMAL#
PAYEE_MOBILE = #payeeMobile:VARCHAR#
BANK_ORDERID = #bankOrderId:VARCHAR#
FOREIGN_ORDERID = #foreignOrderId:VARCHAR#
FUNDOUT_BANKCODE = #fundoutBankCode:VARCHAR#
FUNDOUT_BANKNAME = #fundoutBankName:VARCHAR#
FUNDOUT_MODE = #fundoutMode:DECIMAL#
PRIORITY = #priority:DECIMAL#
PARENT_ORDERID = #parentOrderId:DECIMAL#
BANK_NUMBER = #bankNumber:VARCHAR#
CHANNEL_CODE = #channelCode:VARCHAR#
where ORDER_ID = #orderId:DECIMAL#

update FUNDOUT_ORDER set ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:DECIMAL#, ORDER_TYPE = #record.orderType:DECIMAL#, ORDER_SMALLTYPE = #record.orderSmallType:VARCHAR#, ORDER_STATUS = #record.orderStatus:DECIMAL#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #record.orderAmount:DECIMAL#, IS_PAYERPAYFEE = #record.isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#, FEE = #record.fee:DECIMAL#, REALPAY_AMOUNT = #record.realpayAmount:DECIMAL#, REALOUT_AMOUNT = #record.realoutAmount:DECIMAL#, PAYER_NAME = #record.payerName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_LOGINNAME = #record.payerLoginName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #record.payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #record.payerMemberType:DECIMAL#, PAYER_ACCTCODE = #record.payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#, PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #record.payerAcctType:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_NAME = #record.payeeName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKACCTCODE = #record.payeeBankAcctCode:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKACCTTYPE = #record.payeeBankAcctType:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_BANKCODE = #record.payeeBankCode:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKNAME = #record.payeeBankName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_OPENINGBANKNAME = #record.payeeOpeningBankName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCE = #record.payeeBankProvince:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCENAME = #record.payeeBankProvinceName:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKCITY = #record.payeeBankCity:VARCHAR#, PAYEE_BANKCITYNAME = #record.payeeBankCityName:VARCHAR#, PAYMENT_REASON = #record.paymentReason:VARCHAR#, FAILED_REASON = #record.failedReason:VARCHAR#, CREATE_DATE = #record.createDate:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATE_DATE = #record.updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, TRADE_ALIAS = #record.tradeAlias:VARCHAR#, TRADE_TYPE = #record.tradeType:DECIMAL#, PAYEE_MOBILE = #record.payeeMobile:VARCHAR#, BANK_ORDERID = #record.bankOrderId:VARCHAR#, FOREIGN_ORDERID = #record.foreignOrderId:VARCHAR#, FUNDOUT_BANKCODE = #record.fundoutBankCode:VARCHAR#, FUNDOUT_BANKNAME = #record.fundoutBankName:VARCHAR#, FUNDOUT_MODE = #record.fundoutMode:DECIMAL#, PRIORITY = #record.priority:DECIMAL#, PARENT_ORDERID = #record.parentOrderId:DECIMAL#, BANK_NUMBER = #record.bankNumber:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT NVL(SUM(nvl(ORDER_AMOUNT,0)*nvl(FUNDOUT_RATE,1)),0) FROM FUNDOUT_ORDER T WHERE T.PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
T.ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#
AND T.CREATE_DATE > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND (T.ORDER_STATUS = 101 OR T.ORDER_STATUS = 111)

SELECT NVL(SUM(nvl(ORDER_AMOUNT,0)*nvl(FUNDOUT_RATE,1)),0) FROM FUNDOUT_ORDER T WHERE T.PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
T.ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#
AND T.CREATE_DATE > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM'), 'yyyy-MM') AND (T.ORDER_STATUS = 101 OR T.ORDER_STATUS = 111)

SELECT NVL(COUNT(1),0) FROM FUNDOUT_ORDER T WHERE T.PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
T.ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#
AND T.CREATE_DATE > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND (T.ORDER_STATUS = 101 OR T.ORDER_STATUS = 111)

SELECT NVL(COUNT(1),0) FROM FUNDOUT_ORDER T WHERE T.PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
T.ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#
AND T.CREATE_DATE > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM'), 'yyyy-MM') AND (T.ORDER_STATUS = 101 OR T.ORDER_STATUS = 111)

SELECT ORDER_ID orderId, ORDER_TYPE orderType, ORDER_SMALLTYPE orderSmallType, ORDER_STATUS orderStatus, ORDER_AMOUNT orderAmount, IS_PAYERPAYFEE isPayerPayFee, FEE fee, REALPAY_AMOUNT realpayAmount, REALOUT_AMOUNT realoutAmount, PAYER_NAME payerName, PAYER_LOGINNAME payerLoginName, PAYER_MEMBERCODE payerMemberCode, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE payerMemberType, PAYER_ACCTCODE payerAcctCode, PAYER_ACCTTYPE payerAcctType, PAYEE_NAME payeeName, PAYEE_BANKACCTCODE payeeBankAcctCode, PAYEE_BANKACCTTYPE payeeBankAcctType, PAYEE_BANKCODE payeeBankCode, PAYEE_BANKNAME payeeBankName, PAYEE_OPENINGBANKNAME payeeOpeningBankName, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCE payeeBankProvince, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCENAME payeeBankProvinceName, PAYEE_BANKCITY payeeBankCity, PAYEE_BANKCITYNAME payeeBankCityName, PAYMENT_REASON paymentReason, FAILED_REASON failedReason, CREATE_DATE createDate, UPDATE_DATE updateDate, TRADE_ALIAS tradeAlias, TRADE_TYPE tradeType, PAYEE_MOBILE payeeMobile, BANK_ORDERID bankOrderId, FOREIGN_ORDERID foreignOrderId, FUNDOUT_BANKCODE fundoutBankCode, FUNDOUT_BANKNAME fundoutBankName, FUNDOUT_MODE fundoutMode, PRIORITY priority, PARENT_ORDERID parentOrderId, CHANNEL_CODE channelCode FROM FO.FUNDOUT_ORDER
PARENT_ORDERID = #orderId#
PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #memberCode#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FO.FUNDOUT_ORDER
PARENT_ORDERID = #orderId#
PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #memberCode#

SELECT t.ORDER_ID orderId, t.PAYEE_NAME payeeName, t.PAYEE_LOGINNAME payeeLoginName, t.ORDER_AMOUNT orderAmount, t.PAYMENT_REASON paymentReason, t.ORDER_STATUS orderStatus from PAY_TOACCTORDER t
PARENT_ORDERID = #orderId#
PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #memberCode#

SELECT COUNT(1) from PAY_TOACCTORDER t
PARENT_ORDERID = #orderId#
PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #memberCode#
